item.title: Double Down Auction
item.description:
Get ready to Double Down in our end of term Showdown auction draft! Use a set budget to bid against players for Pokemon that you think will give you the best chance for success in this VGC Reg H tourney! The format will be bo3 open team sheets, with 3-4 rounds of Swiss based on the number of players.
Sign up on our Discord by November 16th to participate in the auction. The tourney itself will take place during our Tuesday social at MC2017 and on our Discord on November 25th. If you can't participate in the auction, a random team of leftover Pokemon will be given to you, but there's no saying how good it will be, so show up the auction if you can!
The prize for the winner of this tourney will be a Sitting Cuties Incineroar plushie!
If you have any questions, DM us on insta or join our Discord for more info. The link to our Discord is in our bio!
Double Down Auction ðŸ—“ï¸ Nov 16, 6-8pm ðŸ“ Discord
Double Down Tourney ðŸ—“ï¸ Nov 25, 6-9pm ðŸ“ MC 2017

item.title: AMATH Prof Talk
item.description:
Come join us for an AMATH Prof Talk on neural networks and dynamical systems!
Abstract: In machine learning, neural networks are often used in a feed-forward manner. Or, when a population of neurons is recurrently connected, the updates happen in synchronized jumps. But the neurons in your brain are operating in continuous time. I will show you some ways to bridge the gap to biology, and treat networks of interconnected neurons as a dynamical system. Then, we'll co-opt those networks to do our bidding, and get them to solve dynamical systems.
Pizza and refreshments will be provided to PMC members.

item.title: From Outages to Ownership
item.description:
From Outages to Ownership: Disaster Recovery, DNS, and Career Journeys in Okta Engineering
Ready to see how a top tech company handles the really big challenges? Join us and our Okta engineers for an evening focused on the critical work that keeps our services running; even when major outages happen. Our Staff Software Engineer will kick off the event with a fascinating technical talk, diving into DNS, redundancy, and disaster recovery based on her real-world experience at Okta. Itâ€™s a timely look at how engineering teams build for reliability at scale.
After the deep-dive, youâ€™ll hear from a panel of Engineers from various teams as they share their own career paths, offer a peek into their day-to-day work, and give you practical advice for launching your career. Stick around for our informal networking mixer to connect one-on-one with the team and ask any final questions!

item.title: Womenâ€™s Centre X Glow Centre Chest Casting Workshop
item.description:
Join the Womenâ€™s Centre and Glow on Friday, November 21 in the Womenâ€™s Centre (SLC 3104) for an event celebrating your body in a safe environment! Create a plaster cast of your chest as a way to honour and connect with your body.
No matter the size and shape of your bust, every woman-identifying person and non-binary-identifying person is welcome at the event!
There will also be a discussion on the sexualization and feminization of chests, and how these narratives can perpetuate transphobia and body image issues. Together, weâ€™ll explore new ways of seeing our bodies to help foster more positive and affirming self-perception.
Three FREE sessions are available: 11AM â€“ 12 PM 1 PM â€“ 2 PM 3 PM â€“ 4 PM* Glow Centre â€“ run session
Registration will be open from November 3 through November 21 at 3 p.m., or until all available spots are filled. Please register early to secure your place using the link below!
âš ï¸ Accessibility, Comfort & Health Notice
This is a messy craft activity using paper mÃ¢chÃ© materials, so please wear clothes you donâ€™t mind getting dirty.
Participants will remove clothing from their upper body in a small, private group setting (about 10 people). We understand this can feel vulnerable â€” please know itâ€™s a safe and body-positive space, and you can opt out or pause at any time.
If you have allergies, skin sensitivities, or accessibility needs, please contact us in advance so we can make accommodations.
This event is exclusive to Waterloo undergrad students.

item.description:
The UWAC Team is thrilled to announce that registration for UWAC 2025 is now open! Register for a chance to compete for cash prizes, build valuable skills through sponsor-led workshops, and connect with students and industry professionals at Canadaâ€™s leading undergraduate accounting conference! item.title: Voices Empower Walk
item.description: Join us for the Voices Empower Walk on November 22. Meet at the UWaterloo ION Station at 12:20 PM or at Uptown Square before 1 PM. The event runs from 1â€“4 PM. Everyone is welcome. Every six days in Canada, a woman is killed by her intimate partner. In 2024 alone, 187 femicides were recorded nationwide 62 in Ontario between November 2023 and November 2024. This rise in violence demands action. We cannot stay silent. When we walk together, we honor those lost, stand with survivors, and raise funds to help women, gender-diverse people, and children move beyond violence. Together, we walk for change. ðŸ’œ

item.title: Double Down Tourney
item.description:
Get ready to Double Down in our end of term Showdown auction draft! Use a set budget to bid against players for Pokemon that you think will give you the best chance for success in this VGC Reg H tourney! The format will be bo3 open team sheets, with 3-4 rounds of Swiss based on the number of players.
Sign up on our Discord by November 16th to participate in the auction. The tourney itself will take place during our Tuesday social at MC2017 and on our Discord on November 25th. If you can't participate in the auction, a random team of leftover Pokemon will be given to you, but there's no saying how good it will be, so show up the auction if you can!
The prize for the winner of this tourney will be a Sitting Cuties Incineroar plushie!
If you have any questions, DM us on insta or join our Discord for more info. The link to our Discord is in our bio!
Double Down Auction ðŸ—“ï¸ Nov 16, 6-8pm ðŸ“ Discord
Double Down Tourney ðŸ—“ï¸ Nov 25, 6-9pm ðŸ“ MC 2017
